name: Adventure Dubai
description: Dubai is the place to get your adrenaline pumping, and our excellent operators ensure you experience it all safely and securely. Take in our landscape from above in a seaplane, hot-air balloon - or, for the truly adventurous, a skydive. Once you’re safely back on ground level, enjoy afternoons of desert dune-bashing, golf, swimming with dolphins and sharks, kite surfing and more.
